p: DMSO and rupintrivir were purchased from Sigma Chemical Co. (St. Louis, MO, USA). 2â€²- C-Me-A was obtained from Carbosynth Limited (Compton, Berkshire, UK). Solutions of GA and GS in DMSO were provided by X. Zhang (Department of Chemistry, Pennsylvania State University) and J. Frydman (Department of Biology, Stanford University), respectively. All the antiviral compounds were prediluted in DMSO for use. For no drug groups, same volumes of DMSO were spiked into the culture medium.
